name: Small Growth
description:
[CONTROLS]

F - Activate honey ability

Mouse movement

[TIPS]

  • Honey ability shields plant for 3 seconds while also defeating the venus fly traps.
  • Flies(The ones that follow you) can only be defeated by the venus fly traps.(the enemies that appear and stay in place)
  • Lead the flies to the venus flytraps mouth in order to successfully defeat it
  • Bees that fly across the screen provide the honey abilities (Max 3).

[DESCRIPTION]

Enter the world as a plant and work your way towards growth!

There are some nasty pests that want to prevent your growth so be careful!

This game was made within 3 days for the Spring 2D Jam with the theme: Growth.
